title: New River Gorge National River: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning             Planning          Â   Planning documents currently available include:  Cultural Affiliation Statement Climbing Management Plan Fire Management Plan Nuttallburg Visitor Use Area Implementation Plan / EA Environmental Assessment: Design and Build Two Stacked Loop Hiking and Biking Trail Systems, Develop Three Trails on Existing Roads, Analyze Bike Use on Park Trails General Management Plan Fire Management Plan - Finding of No Significant Impact Trail Development Plan Phase One: Through Park Connector; Northern Half, River Left Alternative Transportation Feasibility Study - River Access Sites Connecting the Parks with their Gateway Communities - Concept Plan Mussel Relocation & Monitoring Project in support of WVDOH replacement of Thomas Buford Pugh bridge (categorical exclusion)
